trans-unit.source: Specifies whether smoothing (antialiasing) is applied to lines and curves and the edges of filled areas.
trans-unit.target: 다듬기 (앤티앨리어싱) 선, 곡선 및 채워진 영역의 가장자리에 적용 되는지 여부를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Default, None, and HighSpeed are equivalent and specify rendering without smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: Default, None, 및 HighSpeed 동일 하며, 다듬기를 적용 하지 않고 렌더링을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: AntiAlias and HighQuality are equivalent and specify rendering with smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: 앤티앨리어싱 및 HighQuality 동일 하며 다듬기가 적용 된 렌더링을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is specified by using the SmoothingMode enumeration, it does not affect text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 때는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>SmoothingMode 열거형을 사용 하 여 속성을 지정한 경우 텍스트 영향을 주지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To set the text rendering quality, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 렌더링 품질을 설정 하려면는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 및 <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>열거형.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is specified by using the SmoothingMode enumeration, it does not affect areas filled by a path gradient brush.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 때는<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> SmoothingMode 열거형을 사용 하 여 속성을 지정한 경우 경로 그라데이션 브러시로 채워진 영역은 영향을 주지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Areas filled by using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the setting for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 채워진 영역은 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>에 대 한 설정에 관계 없이 동일한 방식으로 (별칭) 렌더링 되는 개체는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>
